snippet.title: SILVER CHAINS - Official Teaser (Indie Survival Horror Game)
snippet.description:
Silver Chains - Official Teaser

What would you do if you were in an abandoned mansion in prison? The ordinary teenage boy mysteriously appeared on the threshold of an old mansion. Whether you want it or not you have to cross the threshold to meet your fears face to face and blow off the dust from the mysteries of the past. Try not to let fear take hold of your mind, because only a clear mind and instincts will give you a chance to survive and get out of the maze of the past.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cracked_heads
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/crackedheadsgames/
Our website: http://crackedheadsgames.com
